dmca.title: DMCA Infringement Notice
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Ian [mailto:ian@designbyian.com] 
Sent: Monday, June 13, 2005 3:50 PM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Infringement Notice

Hello,

The following site, hosted on your network, is powered by pirated software:
ushuaiafce.org

The site is at the following IP:
67.18.47.210

To help verify my ownership of these scripts, you may find my email address
(ian@designbyian.com) in the source code of some or all of the copied
scripts (if it has not been removed by the time you read this). Please do
not share this information with the website owner as it would facilitate
future piracy.

The scripts appear to be located in the cgi-bin directory. Some of the
pirated scripts will also probably be located in an additional sub directory
called /include.

Here is a partial list of scripts that, if found, are definitely pirated:
sf.cgi, q.cgi, emngr.cgi, clickstats.cgi, searchstats.cgi, proxyguard.cgi,
earnings.cgi, memclicks.cgi, cntryadmin.cgi, confirm.cgi, countrystats.cgi,
clickcontrol.cgi, xmltweak.cgi, pglive.cgi, inactive.cgi, backup.cgi,
feedme.cgi, menume.cgi, miscme.cgi.

It is also likely that the base search engine script powering this site is
an illegal copy of scripts owned by SmarterScripts.com. These scripts will
contain code modifications copyrighted by me. This is in addition to the
complete scripts mentioned above. Base scripts that probably contain pirated
code modifications:
smartsearch.cgi, go.cgi, include.cgi, accounts.cgi, crawl.cgi,
admin_misc.cgi, functions.cgi, search.cgi and a variety of others.

I affirm that I am the sole owner of the copyrighted material in question
and that all information contained herein is accurate under penalty of
perjury. 

I have attached a digital scan of my signature.

I am requesting immediate removal. Please reply to confirm that the illegal
material is no longer online.

Let me know if you have questions.

Thank you,

Ian Kelley

______________________________________________________________________
Ian Kelley - Web Design and Programming
Ending world hunger through clever UI implementation.

Over ten years experience with HTML, web graphics, SEO and user interface
(UI) design. Over five years experience with PHP, Databases, DHTML, Flash,
Javascript, XML, CSS, and CGI (perl). Three years experience with Apache web
server running on Unix/Linux along with various server management software
packages.

Website: http://www.designbyian.com/
Email: ian@designbyian.com
